billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Authorizes payment of personal income tax by credit card
summary: Requires the tax commissioner to establish regulations and procedures to authorize payment of personal income tax by credit card and to prescribe the manner and conditions appropriate thereto, on or before 9/1/2009; provides that it shall apply to returns filed for taxable years commencing on and after 1/1/2011.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to payment of personal income tax by credit card
